trade_signal_metadata.name: Divergence Trader: Swing & Candle Patterns
trade_signal_metadata.desc: This advanced trading algorithm identifies critical divergences between swing strength and candlestick clarity on a 4-hour timeframe. Designed for both trending and consolidating markets, it aims to pinpoint high-probability reversal opportunities to maximize trading potential.
